channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Simple Adsense Insertion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Simple Adsense Insertion

item.title: CVE-2022-1695|2024-08-03T00:10:03.866Z -- unknown -- wp%20simple%20adsense%20insertion
item.description: The WP Simple Adsense Insertion WordPress plugin before 2.1 does not perform CSRF checks on updates to its admin page, allowing an attacker to trick a logged in user to manipulate ads and inject arbitrary javascript via submitting a form.
